author: Shinkai

promptStructure.description: Template for generating PDF summary. Define key points to extract and summary style/length

voicePrompt.description: Voice style instructions (tone, pace, emphasis). Optional - uses neutral style if not provided

description: Extracts text from a PDF, summarizes it, and converts the summary to speech.
name: PDF Summarize to Audio

pdfURL.description: Public HTTP/HTTPS URL to PDF file. Must be accessible and valid PDF format

audioFilePath.description: Absolute path to generated MP3 audio file. Created in system temp directory

audiotext.description: Text content that was converted to speech. Useful for verification

summaryText.description: Concise summary of PDF content based on promptStructure template
